get.summary: Gets a list of appointments
get.description: Gets a list of appointments

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Perform lookup by multiple IDs (maximum 50)

parameters.name: active
parameters.description:
What kind of items should be returned (only active items will be returned by default)\
Values: [True, Any, False]

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Return all appointments for this job

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Return all appointments for jobs that are part of this project

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Return all appointments with this appointment number

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Return items with specified status AppointmentStatus\
Values: [Scheduled, Dispatched, Working, Hold, Done, Canceled]

parameters.name: startsOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return appointments that start on or after the specified date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: startsBefore
parameters.description: Return appointments that start before the specified date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: technicianId
parameters.description: Return appointments this technician is assigned to

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Return appointments for the specified Customer

parameters.name: unused
parameters.description: Return appointments that are unused

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Return appointments modified before a certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return appointments modified on or after a certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return appointments created on or after a certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Return appointments created before a certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Applies sorting by the specified field:\
"?sort=+FieldName" for ascending order,\
"?sort=-FieldName" for descending order.\
\
Available fields are: Id, ModifiedOn, CreatedOn.

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

get.summary: Provides export feed for jobs
get.description: Provides export feed for jobs

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Continuation token received from previous export request in "continueFrom" field.
When not specified, the export process starts from the beginning.\
Use custom date strings, e.g. "2020-01-01" to start the export process from the certain point in time.

parameters.name: includeRecentChanges
parameters.description:
Use "true" to start receiving the most recent changes quicker.
Note this may cause the same results appearing multiple times on consecutive requests.

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

get.summary: Gets a list of jobs
get.description: Gets a list of jobs

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Perform lookup by multiple IDs (maximum 50)

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Filters by job number

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Filters by project ID

parameters.name: bookingId
parameters.description: Filters by booking ID that resulted in this job

parameters.name: jobStatus
parameters.description:
Filters by job status
            \
Values: [Scheduled, Dispatched, InProgress, Hold, Completed, Canceled]

parameters.name: appointmentStatus
parameters.description:
Filters by appointment status. Return a job if it has any appointment with the specified status.
            \
Values: [Scheduled, Dispatched, Working, Hold, Done, Canceled]

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Filters by priority. Supported priorities are "Low", "Normal", "High", "Urgent"

parameters.name: firstAppointmentStartsOnOrAfter
parameters.description:
Return jobs whose first appointment starts on or after date/time (in UTC). Use with
"firstAppointmentStartsBefore" to find jobs whose first appointment is within the specified date range.

parameters.name: firstAppointmentStartsBefore
parameters.description: Return jobs whose first appointment starts before date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: appointmentStartsOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return jobs if any appointment starts after date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: appointmentStartsBefore
parameters.description: Return jobs if any appointment starts after date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: technicianId
parameters.description: Return jobs if technician is assigned to any appointment

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Filters by job's customer ID

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Filters by job's location ID

parameters.name: soldById
parameters.description: Filters by the technician who sold the job

parameters.name: jobTypeId
parameters.description: Filters by job type ID

parameters.name: campaignId
parameters.description: Filters by job's campaign ID

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: Filters by job's business unit ID

parameters.name: invoiceId
parameters.description: Filters by job's invoice ID

parameters.name: createdFromEstimateId
parameters.description: Filters by the sold estimate ID from which the job was created

parameters.name: estimateIds
parameters.description: Filters by estimate IDs that are related to the job

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Return items created before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items created on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Return items modified before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items modified on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: completedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return jobs that are completed after a certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: completedBefore
parameters.description: Return jobs that are completed before a certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: tagTypeIds
parameters.description: Return jobs that have at least one of provided Tag Type assigned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Applies sorting by the specified field:\
"?sort=+FieldName" for ascending order,\
"?sort=-FieldName" for descending order.\
\
Available fields are: Id, ModifiedOn, CreatedOn, Priority.

parameters.name: externalDataApplicationGuid
parameters.description:
If this guid is provided, external data corresponding to
this application guid will be returned.

parameters.name: externalDataKey
parameters.description: Performs lookup by external data key, 'externalDataValues' must also be provided.

parameters.name: externalDataValues
parameters.description: Performs lookup by external data values (maximum 50), 'externalDataKey' must also be provided.

parameters.name: hasUnusedAppointments
parameters.description: If set to true, return jobs that have unused appointments.

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

get.summary: Gets a list of projects
get.description: Gets a list of projects

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Tenant ID

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Perform lookup by multiple IDs (maximum 50)

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Filters by customer ID

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Filters by location ID

parameters.name: projectTypeId
parameters.description: Return projects if it contains the specified project type

parameters.name: invoiceId
parameters.description: Return projects if it contains the specified invoice

parameters.name: technicianId
parameters.description: Return project if technician is assigned to any appointments on any job in the project

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Return project if it contains the specified job

parameters.name: appointmentId
parameters.description: Return project if it contains the specified appointment in the project's jobs

parameters.name: projectManagerIds
parameters.description: Filters by id of managers for matching project

parameters.name: businessUnitIds
parameters.description: Returns projects which have at least one of the provided business units assigned

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Return items created before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return items created on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: startsBefore
parameters.description: Return projects that start before date

parameters.name: startsOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return projects that start on or after date

parameters.name: completedBefore
parameters.description: Return projects that are completed before date

parameters.name: completedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return projects that are completed on or after date

parameters.name: targetCompletionDateBefore
parameters.description: Return projects whose target completion date is before date

parameters.name: targetCompletionDateOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return projects whose target completion date is on or after date

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Return projects whose last modification date is before date

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return projects whose last modification date is on or after date

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Returns projects which have one of the provided statuses.
"None" could be passed as one of the values to include projects without a status in the resulting collection.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Applies sorting by the specified field:\
"?sort=+FieldName" for ascending order,\
"?sort=-FieldName" for descending order.\
\
Available fields are: Id, ModifiedOn, CreatedOn, Name, TargetCompletionDate.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Applies sorting by the specified field:\
"?sort=+FieldName" for ascending order,\
"?sort=-FieldName" for descending order.\
\
Available fields are: Id, Name, Order, ModifiedOn, CreatedOn.

hasMore.description:
Indicates whether the export feed has reached its logical "end", or if there is more to export.
True means the consumer can invoke another request right away using new continuation token value.
False means there is now new data for the export, and the consumer should wait for some time (5-10 minutes)
before making another request.

continueFrom.description: Continuation token used to resume the export operation. The value should be used in "from" query parameter of the following request.

data.description: The collection of exported items, usually sorted chronologically based on modification date

externalData.description:
List of external data attached to this job,
that corresponds to the application guid provided in the request.

lastAppointmentId.description: ID of the last appointment on the job

warrantyId.description: ID of the job for which this job is a warranty

Items that are created with a specific guid, could be fetched/updated/removed
only when the same application guid is provided.

completedOn.description: Date on which the job was completed

businessUnitId.description: ID of the job's business unit

jobGeneratedLeadSource.description:
Object that contains:
JobId: ID of the job from which this job was generated
EmployeeId: ID of the office user or technician

shouldUpdateInvoiceItems.description: If set to true, update the business unit of invoice items on job's invoice

customFields.description:
List of custom fields and their values. This list must describe the full list of custom fields on the job.
If job A has values for custom fields X and Y and this field only contains a model for custom field X, then
the value for custom field Y on job A will be removed.

tagTypeIds.description:
List of tag types. This list must describe the full list of tags on the job. If job A has tags X and Y and
this field only contains a ID for tag X, then tag Y on job A will be removed.

soldById.description: ID of the Technician who sold the job.

patchMode.description:
External data patch mode.\
"Replace" (default) replaces all existing keys with new values. If job A has custom data with keys X and Y and this field only contains an item
with a key X, then custom data with a key Y on job A will be removed.\
"Merge" will only replace key X in the example above. Keys with null value will be deleted.

applicationGuid.description:
Items that are created with a specific guid, could be fetched/updated/removed
only when the same application guid is provided.

hasMore.description: True if there are more records in the query than returned in this result

totalCount.description: Total count of records for this query (can optionally be populated)

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

specversion.description: The version of the CloudEvents specification used by this event ("1.0").

id.description: A value that uniquely identifies this event. Consumers should assume that events with the same source and id are duplicates.

type.description: A value that identifies the type of this event ("tn.jpm.job-appointment-updated").

time.description: The date and time when this event occurred.

source.description: A URI that identifies the source of this event ("https://webhooks.servicetitan.io").

userassignedid.description: A value that identifies this event. This value is for diagnostic purposes only, and it may or may not be unique.

datacontenttype.description: The content type of the data ("application/json").

data.description: The event payload.

jobId.description: ID of the job that the appointment was created for

arrivalWindowStart.description: Arrival window start date/time (in UTC), if configured

arrivalWindowEnd.description: Arrival window end date/time (in UTC), if configured

specialInstructions.description: Special instructions associated to the appointment

createdOn.description: When the appointment was created (in UTC)

modifiedOn.description: When the appointment was modified (in UTC)

customerId.description: Id of a customer that the appointment was created for

unused.description: Returns true if the appointment is unused

createdById.description: ID of the user that created the appointment

isConfirmed.description: Returns true if the appointment is confirmed

specversion.description: The version of the CloudEvents specification used by this event ("1.0").

id.description: A value that uniquely identifies this event. Consumers should assume that events with the same source and id are duplicates.

type.description: A value that identifies the type of this event ("tn.jpm.job-completed").

time.description: The date and time when this event occurred.

source.description: A URI that identifies the source of this event ("https://webhooks.servicetitan.io").

userassignedid.description: A value that identifies this event. This value is for diagnostic purposes only, and it may or may not be unique.

datacontenttype.description: The content type of the data ("application/json").

data.description: The event payload.

completedOn.description: Date/time (in UTC) when the job was completed

businessUnitId.description: ID of the job's business unit

appointmentCount.description: Number of appointments on the job

firstAppointmentId.description: ID of the first appointment on the job

lastAppointmentId.description: ID of the last appointment on the job

recallForId.description: ID of the job for which this job is a recall

warrantyId.description: ID of the job for which this job is a warranty

jobGeneratedLeadSource.description:
Object that contains:
JobId: ID of the job from which this job was generated
EmployeeId: ID of the office user or technician

noCharge.description: Whether the job is a no-charge job

notificationsEnabled.description: Whether notifications will be sent to customers

createdOn.description: Date/time (in UTC) when the job was created

createdById.description: ID of the user who created the job

modifiedOn.description: Date/time (in UTC) when job was last modified

leadCallId.description: ID of the Call that resulted in this job

partnerLeadCallId.description: ID of the Call that 3rd-party agents are enabled to set.

bookingId.description: ID of the Booking that resulted in this job

soldById.description: ID of the Technician that sold this job

invoiceId.description: ID of the invoice associated with this job.

membershipId.description: ID of the Membership associated with this job.

createdFromEstimateId.description: ID of the sold estimate from which this job was created

estimateIds.description: IDs of estimates that are related to this job
